pages.text: This "crying obsidian" material piques my interest. So far, the "tears" it creates have soaked into other materials in a matter of seconds.$(br2)...if only enough of them can be contained for a detailed study.

Perhaps... trying to hold it in a noble metal? Something like gold, that shouldn't be too hard to test.$(br2)This doesn't sound completely unreasonable. I should try adding it to something like a "cauldron"...$(br2)I have a lot of junk I could drop in.
